title: Storytelling-Based Advanced Corporate Law Education: Reality-Connected Legal Understanding

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Learners are science professionals struggling with corporate law application; they integrate theory and practice through case-based exercises.

learning_goals: Explain practical applications of corporate law provisions by reconstructing real-world corporate cases into narratives
Propose solutions for legal disputes through storytelling scenarios developed by learners
Analyze the impact of core corporate law concepts on contractual and liability issues in scientific research/technology development fields
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
